title: # 448 - Colin Quinn & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Colin Quinn. We talk about Colin getting covid, Tough Crowd, Trolling, Patrice O’Neal, Serial Killers, Drive-In Shows, History, and much more!

 

Colin Quinn’s new special “Colin Quinn & Friends: A Parking Lot Comedy Show” is now available on HBO Max

 

Colin Quinn also has a new book “Over Stated: A Coast to Coast Roast of the 50 States” available here: https://www.amazon.com/Overstated-Coast-Coast-Roast-States/dp/1250268443 

 

Check out my new show “Go Big Show” Thursdays at 9pm PST on TBS! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Keeps. If you’re ready to take action and prevent hair loss, go to http://www.Keeps.com/bertcast to receive your first month of treatment for free.

 

This episode is also brought to you by cbdMD. Get 25% OFF your next order when you use the promo code “BERT” at checkout. Go to http://www.cbdmd.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Vuori. Receive 20% off your first purchase, but enjoy free shipping on any U.S. orders over $75 and free returns. Go to http://www.vuoriclothing.com/BERT and discover the versatility of Vuori Clothing.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert  

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
